definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Its closest relatives are Turkish and Turkmen.
sentences.chinese: 與它最接近的是土耳其語和土庫曼語。
土耳其語是一種膠著語。

sentences.english: English is understood all over the world while turkish is spoken by only a few people outside turkey itself .
sentences.chinese: 英語世界通行，而土耳其語脫離本國就很少有人說了。

sentences.english: English is understood all over the world while Turkish is spoken by only a few people outside Turkey itself.
sentences.chinese: 英語世界通行，而土耳其語離開本國就很少有人說了。

sentences.english: That’s the end of my Turkish but good evening.
sentences.chinese: 這是我僅能說的土耳其語，即晚上好。
